title: CYBERLINK DIRECTOR SUITE MultiLang x86 x64 v2.0-DVTiSO [deepstat
description:
CYBERLINK DIRECTOR SUITE MultiLang x86 x64 v2.0
Fastest Video and Photo Editing Software
Complete Solution With Color Grading & Audio Production









Director Suite 2 includes 4 award-winning media creativity applications - PowerDirector 12, ColorDirector 2, AudioDirector 4 and PhotoDirector 5, offering the most complete, video and photo editing solution designed for creative experts. With round-trip-editing support, the 4 applications in Director Suite work seamlessly with each other, providing the smoothest post-production environment for pro users.







Powerful Video Editing Ã¢â‚¬â€œ PowerDirector 12

PowerDirector 12 provides the most comprehensive tools for high-quality video productions Ã¢â‚¬â€ all with easy-to-use features and the fastest 64-bit video editing. Featuring new MultiCam Designer that supports 4 camera editing. Easily import, sync, and arrange MultiCam shots. The new Theme Designer helps you generate 3D animation with your videos and photos. PowerDirector 12 supports end-to-end editing of 4K ultra HD video format. Unleash creativity with over 100 video editing tools. Edit more efficiently with TrueVelocity and produce breathtaking 4K movies on disc or publish online right from your desktop.


Creative Image Editing Ã¢â‚¬â€œ PhotoDirector 5

PhotoDirector 5 is a unique application that combines all the features you need for photography in a single workflow Ã¢â‚¬â€ efficient photo management, complete adjustment, and creative editing. With native 64-bit support, PhotoDirector enhances your photos in a non-destructive process, and RAW support for popular DSLRs and 4K Ultra output, PhotoDirector is all you need to turn your photos into works of art. Featuring unique People Beautifier toolset that includes Body Shaper, this contours body figure and takes away extra pounds that cameras put onto people.


Advanced Video Color Grading Ã¢â‚¬â€œ ColorDirector 2

ColorDirector comes with a complete set of tools to correct white balance, adjust tonality, and enhance and stylize the colors within your videos. All the professional tools you need to get your videos looking betterÃ¢â‚¬â€from fixing color problems to enhancing your videos creatively and tastefullyÃ¢â‚¬â€can be found right on your desktop. And now with new support for Ultra HD 4K files and a huge range of popular video formats you can use ColorDirector to improve all the videos you take.


Professional Audio Production Ã¢â‚¬â€œ AudioDirector 4

Create sophisticated surround sound projects using dynamic panning technology on any existing mono or multichannel audio file. AudioDirector 4 intuitive controls let you quickly add and adjust keyframe positions to change an audio trackÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s volume or pan between L-R channels over time. Smart transitions are effective way to move from one piece of background music to another without a glaring break. Choose from tempo, DJ scratch, or smooth repeat transitions.




Exclusive Effects & Templates

PowerDirector 12 Ultimate exclusively includes premium effects and templates to further enrich your video creation. These include two professional effect packs from world-class NewBlueFX Ã¢â‚¬â€ Video ESSENTIALS II & III Ã¢â‚¬â€ plus three CyberLink Creative Design Packs for your vacation, romance, and holiday video productions.




System Requirements

Microsoft Windows 8/8.1, 7, Vista( 32bit/ 64bit )
Microsoft Windows XP ( 32 bit with Service Pack 3 )

Screen Resolution
1024 x 768, 16-bit color or above
CPU Processor

AVI Capture/Produce: Profiles: Pentium 4 3.0 Ghz or AMD Athlon 64 X2
DVD Quality (MPEG-2) Profiles: Pentium 4 3.0 Ghz or AMD Athlon 64 X2
High Quality MPEG-4 and Streaming WMV, QuickTime) Profiles: Pentium 4 3.0 Ghz or AMD Athlon 64 X2.
Full-HD quality H.264 and MPEG2 Profiles: Intel Corei5/7 or AMD Phenom II X4
AVCHD and BD burning Profiles: Pentium Core 2 Duo E6400, or AMD Phenom II X4
2K/4K/3D video editing profile: Intel Corei7 or AMD FX series with 64 bit OS 6 GB RAM

Memory
2GB required
3GB or above recommended for 32 bit OS
6GB or above recommended for 64 bit OS & 3D editing

Hard Disk Space
6.5 GB required minimum (note: 400 MB is for Magic Music Library)
10 GB (20 GB recommended) for DVD production
60 GB (100 GB recommended) for Blu-ray Disc/AVCHD production

Burning Drive
A CD or DVD burner (CD-R/RW, DVD+R/RW or DVD-R/RW) is required to burn VCD/DVD/SVCD/AVCHD titles
A Blu-ray disc recordable drive is required to burn Blu-ray Discs
Graphics Card

128 MB VGA VRAM or higher (1 GB or higher VRAM and OpenCL capable are recommended)

NVIDIA:
GeForce 8500GT/9800GT and above
GeForce GT/GTS/GTX 200/400/500/600 Series

AMD / ATI :
